p: We extracted and categorized all of the information about medicinal plants evaluated for QQ activity in Iran including scientific name, part of plant used for anti-QS examination, type of extraction and products used (ethanol extract, methanol extract, essential oil), bacterial strains for QQ assays (bacterial biosensor strain or isolated from clinical specimens), plant species with positive anti-QS actions or other effects related to QQ such as antibiofilm activity, type of QQ effect on different strain (phenotypic or molecular), the purpose of studies and application of herbal extracts that authors recommended. Statistical analyses were completed, using Microsoft excel 2019 for numerical calculations.
